title: How a Reclusive Ex-Glencore Trader Became Indonesia’s Nickel King
description: Arif Kurniawan’s fortunes and influence have risen with those of the Southeast Asian nation’s fast-expanding metals industry.
content: Arif Kurniawan’s fortunes and influence have risen with those of the Southeast Asian nation’s fast-expanding metals industry.
